Package camzup.pfriendly

Interface IUpOgl

All Superinterfaces:
IUp
All Known Implementing Classes:
Up3, UpOgl, Yup2, Yup3, Zup3
public interface IUpOgl
extends IUp
Maintains consistent behavior across OpenGL renderers, even when they are of different dimensions.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Interface Description
    static class  IUpOgl.Sampling
    An enumeration to make the texture sampling options available in Processing's OpenGL renderers (P2D and P3D) clearer.
